alert.note: Alert for Huron; Lapeer; Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; Sanilac; St. Clair; Tuscola; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 7:47AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of eastern Tuscola, Sanilac, Monroe, Lapeer, Wayne, eastern Oakland, Macomb, St. Clair and Huron Counties through 915 AM EST... At 746 AM EST, Doppler radar velocity was tracking the lead edge of strong winds along a line extending from Saginaw Bay to near Pontiac to Toledo. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. The strongest winds will last roughly a half an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong Winds will be near... Troy around 755 AM EST. Caseville and Rochester around 800 AM EST. Sterling Heights and Pigeon around 805 AM EST. Clinton, Elkton and Macomb Township around 810 AM EST. Mount Clemens around 815 AM EST. New Baltimore, Bad Axe and Kinde around 825 AM EST. Harsens Island around 840 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Anchorville, Franklin, Stony Point, Ellington, New Greenleaf, Auburn Hills, Samaria, Port Crescent State Park, Filion and Harper Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
